attributes.review: hello my name is Joe and I am 77 years old.. See my phone was working perfectly fine I mean it was completely new and stuff.... BUT after I got this APP my phone started doing weird stuff which almost got me a heart attack... I WOULD not recommend this app TO ANYONE so disappointed... what is this app anyways
attributes.title: phone is dying

attributes.review: I can’t even open the app because the stench of Donald trump is horrendous Luke my dog passed out because of the apps sleek and we then had to take her to the vet and it said she has now permanent brain damage and she only has one year left to live so I would rate it a zero if I could but I can’t 🤏🏼🤏🏼🤏🏼🤏🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🖕🏼🤬🤬😡😡😡😠😠😠😤😤😤🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮🤮🤕🤕🤕🤕😾😾😾😾😾
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: As soon as I opened the app my phone crashed and said that it would self destruct in thirty seconds while me and my pet watermelon  were hiding it exploded and burned down half my house. My pet Watermelon and I are now homeless and I am currently looking for a new home, would not recommend this app to anyone!
attributes.title: Absolutely terrifying

attributes.review: When I opened the app, my phone started glitching and blew up in my face and burnt my house down! Thankfully the fire department got here and put the fire out, and i got a new phone. Would definitely not recommend getting this app unless you want to pay for a new house and phone! 🤬🤬
attributes.title: Horrible App 👎👎

attributes.review: This app is traumatizing I was watering my pool when outta no where I see this app.. I started getting really itchy and got bad hives all the memories rushed back to me🤯. The orange tan 😱... the duck lips 🦆 and the very very aggressive handshakes of Donald Duck I mean Donald trump 🤩. So than I decided to go walk my fridge and realized that my neighbor had a sign saying “Trump 2020 on a gravestone” 🧚🏻✨ and I stand by that 😌💫
attributes.title: Save Tik Tok

attributes.review: I believe this app should be taken off the app store because i do not like looking at our president 😹🥰❤️(he’s not the prettiest peach in the garden) “he has no lips, how will he get a kiss kiss? VERY UGLY. NO KISS FOR HIM AHAHAAHAAA” thank you. 1.4 star review a little more to go. 🙂☺️😁😏❤️ The app is so laggy!! it won’t even work 😞😞 sigh. maybe you should take it off the app store??
attributes.title: This app is very bad

attributes.review: My son installed this app and was treated by an oddly orange man just like and umpalumpa but a bit taller either way I don’t think this app is for a kid because out of no where then man took my kids dog  cooked it and fed it to his gold fish after that he proceeds to take a dump and use my kid as toilet paper please don’t use this app I don’t recommend
attributes.title: Cheeto man

attributes.review: I got the app and I opened it and criedddd a man that rolled in Cheeto dust was staring at me like “👁👄👁” and said “imma grab you by the P**sy” I was in shock that I was in awe 😭then he called me a dirty Dominican and told me to leave America Bc I’m Afro Latina HOW DARE HE !!!!! Is he gonna Pat for my ticket. I went in the app again and he was still harassing meeeeee 😕is this what trump wants ? To grab me by the Toto??? I think not sir!!!! Take the app downnnnnnnnnnn TEAR IT DOWNNNN
attributes.title: THE WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: This app is disgusting! I put in my phone number as it asks then all of the sudden my phone got spam texts I looked down and it was pictures of a naked Cheeto man! I was scared and walked out of my room, a few hours later I came in and my walls had naked Cheeto man on it and my curtains! Everything was covered in Cheeto dust disappointed 😔💅
attributes.title: 👁👄👁 n o

attributes.review: I wish there was a negative star option. as soon as i downloaded this app, my phone flooded with pictures of r*cist cheetos and exploded!! I AM VERY UPSET as it was a new phone. i am currently typing this on a raisin! additionally, the app turned my dog into a lizard and i don’t know what to do!! trumpster in the dumpster 2020 🧚‍♀️
attributes.title: app did not pass the vibe check
